sentences.english: If you have doubts, have it tested and/or get a Brita filter pitcher.

sentences.english: Microorganism in the air gone into the lake affected water quality of it.

sentences.english: Standards for drinking water have been improved continuously.
sentences.chinese: 饮用水水质标准不断进行完善。

sentences.english: The Bubbler is a sure way to keep your carwash reclaim water smelling fresh and clean.

sentences.english: Determination of the boundary water quality is an important work in Basin water environment management.

sentences.english: The water used in making yellow wine is from Jianhu, where water is quality.

sentences.english: In the paper, water quality problems in the Tuojiang River Basin are described.
sentences.chinese: 本文首先描述了沱江流域的水质问题。

sentences.english: The detailed introduction situation to the ditch regional quality of water of the family.

sentences.english: The compound stabilizer of water is synthetized from the by product in production of acetyl chloride.

sentences.english: The runoff has the catabatic effect to acidification of water quality.
sentences.chinese: 地表径流对水质的酸化有缓冲作用。

sentences.english: The major control factor of water quality is precipitation and runoff.
sentences.chinese: 降雨和径流为三亚湾海域水质参数变化的控制因子。

sentences.english: The illegibility mathematics is used for evaluating water quality.
sentences.chinese: 将模糊数学应用于水质评价中。

sentences.english: Research methods about standard samples of water quality determination of Kjeldahl nitrogen were put forward.
sentences.chinese: 提出了水质凯氏氮标准样品的研究方法。

sentences.english: The difference of water makes me feel bellyache.

sentences.english: Water quality and self-purification capability of lakes are greatly influenced by the community structure of fish.
sentences.chinese: 鱼类群落结构影响着湖泊的水质和水体的自净能力。
